import React from 'react'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Pager from '../Components/pager'; class postJob extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = {show : false}; this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); this.handleClose = this.handleClose.bind(this); } handleClick() { this.setState({show: true}); } handleClose() { this.setState({show: false}); } render(){ return(
Signup

Create Password
Confirm Password
Skills
Have an account? login
) } } export default postJob;
